name: Coward Shooterguy
description:
In this short 2D top-down shooter game, you play as Sogeki, a  coward hero that wants to defeat his evil archenemy named Franky in order to save  his girlfriend! He brought a gun to the fight but failed to bring extra ammo.

Now, he needs to find more ammunition scattered around Frankys fortress in order to be able to shoot him.  But it's not that easy! Franky will try to stop our hero by shooting projectiles. Will you be able to dodge them all?

Game made in 8 days for the Game Jaaj 7 game jam.

Note: the GNU/Linux version was not tested, if you find any odd behavior in it, use the HTML5 version or play on Windows.
